attributes.action: Keep Royal Parks open after dark for cyclists
attributes.additional_details:
Royal Parks provide cyclists with several direct routes, away from roads, contributing to a safer and more welcoming cycling environment in the capital.
However, many of these routes are closed after dark, pushing bicycles on to roads at dangerous times, when traffic is still heavily and visibility reduced.
This petition calls on the government to ensure that cycling routes through Royal Parks remain open, either 24 hours a day, or until late at night when the number of vehicles on roads is reduced.
